_sText:
- **VIDEO**: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NqFPlpZAsD4 ( by Creativ3Design)

Fix of my first obstacles/race map created into Portal-like form. You must overcome all the obstacles created by GLaDOS before your opponents. Then, just YOU choose the end.

Contains:
- 9 middle-difficulty levels
- 3 types of end
- settings room
- easter egg (radio)
- good feeling of victory over rivals

What is new?:
- Radio with portal radio song
- the favourite portal song in settings room
- better textures
- glitches are fixed
- Only button in last room will enable spawn kill (so all players have more time to complete this map)
- This time no irritating drugs and movement buttons
- and maybe some levels are a little bit easier I have used similiar textures from CS:S and non-original Portal-like textures.
